hero.title: Anchor-First Landing Page
hero.subtitle: Static, accessible, and ready for dynamic data injection.

features.title: Fast & Lightweight
features.description: Optimized for performance with minimal runtime.

features.title: Accessible by Default
features.description: Semantic markup and clear focus styles.
features.icon: <svg width="48" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M12 3l9 4v6c0 5-3.8 8.74-9 9-5.2-.26-9-4-9-9V7l9-4z" fill="#10b981"/></svg>

features.title: Responsive Layout
features.icon: <svg width="48" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><rect x="3" y="6" width="18" height="12" rx="2" fill="#3b82f6"/><rect x="7" y="9" width="6" height="6" rx="1" fill="white"/></svg>

features.title: Extensible
features.description: Anchor-driven design supports future data injection.
features.icon: <svg width="48" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M8 9l-4 4 4 4" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/><path d="M16 15l4-4-4-4" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/></svg>

about: This page demonstrates an anchor-first static landing with semantic sections and data anchors ready for injection by a templating layer or SPA.
